item.title: Can we ping a Lambda function ?
item.description: Context Can we ping the ENI of a Lambda function within the VPC ? While the answer can be obvious the path to get it was insightful for me and has helped me to be more comfortable with : AWS IAM. Lambdas function. AWS Static IP addresses and AWS default subnets. This test can be performed with the AWS free tier. You will find the Terraform scripts here : Lambda Ping
